# Yelp Review App for Android
 For this challenge, you will use Yelp’s API
 https://www.yelp.com/developers/documentation/v3/get_started
 Build an Android app of Yelp Reviews with following requirements:
 1. App has 3 main screens: Search filter, Search List, Business Detail
 2. Search filter screen displays search criteria: price range, search text, category
 3. When user type string in Category area, matching category name list should be
 displayed so the user easily select category.
 4. When user touch “Search” button, Search result displays in the Search result list screen.
 5. Search result screen: Scrollable 15 restaurants table/collection view. Each cell should
 represent business image, name, count of reviews and rating. Restaurants are sorted
 alphabetically. It is also selectable to go detail page.
 6. Search result list screen should support pagination: When scroll reaches to end of the
 list item, it should display another 15 items.
 7. Business Detail view should represent business name, address, count of reviews, rating
 and latest 3 reviews with user id and photo
 The app must be Android native application coding in Java.
 The app should have at least one Fragment.
 You can implement app with any architecture patterns.
 It could be better if it is testable and if it includes unit tests.
 You are free to use any libraries you want to make your life easier.
 Since you are building without wireframe, the UI does not need to be fancy. It just needs to be
 functional and should have the ability to easily style once the designs and assets become
 available.
 Use recent version of Android studio and Android SDK.
 Source code can be delivered in a zip file or github page.
